about_the_game:
🏰 Forge Your Destiny, Create Your Legacy!
Seize the opportunity to pave your own way, conjure the realms of your imagination, whether they be grand Kingdoms, bustling Cities, or fantastical Worlds. Your journey starts now – take the leap and turn your dream world into a vibrant reality today!

🌐 Design, Create, Build – Unleash Your World, Your Rules!
In Graal Worlds, the canvas is yours! Dive into the depths of creativity with the option to craft your world in exquisite 2D or immersive 3D by securing your own server. Populate it with unique monsters, unleash menacing foes, or let your imagination run wild – your server, your rules. Build majestic kingdoms for you and your comrades to conquer or explore; the possibilities are as boundless as your vision.

👥 Join Thriving Realms and Dynamic Communities!
Embark on a journey through diverse servers and immerse yourself in vibrant communities. Whether you fancy the unique old-school MMORPG vibes of GraalOnline Zodiac or the nostalgic 2D allure of Unholy Nation for a classic MMO experience, GraalOnline Worlds caters to every adventurer.

🚀 Play Anytime, Anywhere – Uninterrupted Multiplatform Adventure!
Seamlessly traverse between Steam, IOS, and Android, because your epic journey is relentless! Share victories, venture into uncharted territories, and connect with like-minded builders. GraalOnline Worlds transcends the realm of a mere game; it's a gateway to adventure, accessible at your fingertips or with the click of a mouse!

**Play Your Beloved Graal Titles**
- Immerse yourself in the classics and latest releases!

**Discover New Realms on Fresh Servers**
- Explore uncharted territories, each with its unique charm!

**Sneak Peeks into Upcoming Titles**
- Be the first to witness the future – exclusive glimpses into upcoming games!

**Free In-Game Editing Tools**
- Shape your world effortlessly with powerful editing tools at your fingertips!

**Connect with Game Designers**
- Join a thriving community of developers, collaborate, and bring your projects to life!

Note to Developers: Connect to 'Worlds Client' from your Desktop Graal Client to configure who has access to your Server.

Seize the opportunity to pave your own way, conjure the realms of your imagination, whether they be grand Kingdoms, bustling Cities, or fantastical Worlds. Your journey starts now – take the leap and turn your dream world into a vibrant reality today!

Populate it with unique monsters, unleash menacing foes, or let your imagination run wild – your server, your rules. ext_user_account_notice: When renting servers on GraalOnline Worlds, please note that a separate third-party account is necessary, independent of your GraalOnline Steam Account. Ensure all necessary purchases are made after setting up this account.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS (version 2.0)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS (version 3.0)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: BigSur 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: BigSur 11 or higher
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Graalonline Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel or Ryzen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Get your games tested by players from around the globe, or test it from anywhere yourself using the new cross-platform application.
